org.wonderly.events
Interface IEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
EventListener
public interface IEventListener
extends Remote

This interface is implemented by classes that provide a subscription service. The subscription is controlled by the methods here-in. The EventManager is the primary user of this interface. The EventManager is used by the components of the System to listen to specified topics as events matching those topics are published in the system.

Author:
Gregg Wonderly.
See Also:
EventManager

unsubscribe

boolean unsubscribe(Subscription sub)
                    throws IOException
Unsubscribe from the passed subscription. The passed subscription information which may either deny reporting of a topic, or require reporting of a topic will be removed from the current subscription list.

Returns:
true if found. false if topic was not found.
Throws:
IOException
